CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Grand Terminal?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Grand Terminal is arc {Valley Terminal}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Valley Terminal?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Valley Terminal is arc {Grand Terminal}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Metro Center} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Harbor Point} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Metro Center to Harbor Point in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Grand Terminal to Harbor Point in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Harbor Point and Metro Center in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Harbor Point and Metro Center is {381}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Metro Center and Grand Terminal in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Metro Center and Grand Terminal is {90}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Valley Terminal?
SC.A: The total flow output from Valley Terminal is {109}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Harbor Point?
SC.A: The total flow input by Harbor Point is {504}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 280? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {381} from {Metro Center} to {Harbor Point}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 40? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {38} from {Valley Terminal} to {Metro Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 48 and 80? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {71} from {Valley Terminal} to {Harbor Point}, a flow of {65} from {Harbor Point} to {Valley Terminal}, a flow of {52} from {Grand Terminal} to {Harbor Point}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Metro Center to Harbor Point or from Harbor Point to Valley Terminal?
NC.A: The flow from {Metro Center} to {Harbor Point} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Metro Center to Valley Terminal, from Metro Center to Harbor Point, or from Metro Center to Grand Terminal?
NC.A: The flow from {Metro Center} to {Harbor Point} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Metro Center}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Harbor Point} and {Metro Center}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Valley Terminal, Arc Harbor Point, Arc Metro Center, Arc Grand Terminal}.
